title: Better Pseudodistributions and Derandomization for Space-Bounded Computation
timeline: A manuscript was first posted online in March 2021; the paper was presented at RANDOM in August 2021.
version-notes: The RANDOM proceedings version and the ECCC version are the same except for minor, superficial differences.
recognition: The paper was invited to the Theory of Computing special issue for RANDOM 2021.
Oded Goldreich discusses the paper in this blog post.
